main event: The observer sighted a yellow flickering light in the sky that appeared to be rising slowly or receding and disappeared after 1 minute.
interesting points: The report includes a hand-drawn sketch or diagram depicting a series of irregularly shaped objects or forms, possibly representing some kind of unidentified aerial phenomenon.

The report contains a questionnaire or form related to the observation of a UFO phenomenon, including questions about the observer's equipment used, their impression of the speed of the phenomenon, and a request to describe the observed phenomenon.
The report mentions that the witness immediately reported the incident to the proper authorities.

The report indicates that the observed object was described as a 'cigar-shaped' aircraft, dark in color with no visible lights, that moved slowly and silently, sometimes hovering and sometimes moving forward in an unusual and erratic manner.
The report concludes that the observed object was not thought to be an ordinary aircraft and was under some kind of intelligent control.
sighted object: A yellow flickering light in the sky
